wikitext.*:
'''Beren''' means "bold" in [[Sindarin]] and may refer to:

* [[Beren (son of Belemir)|Beren]] (born {{FA|374}}), son of [[Belemir]] and grandfather of Beren Erchamion.
* '''[[Beren]] ({{FA|443}} - {{FA|503|n}}), husband of [[Lúthien|Lúthien Tinúviel]] and hero of the [[First Age]].'''
* [[Beren (Steward of Gondor)|Beren]] ({{TA|2655}} - {{TA|2763|n}}), the nineteenth [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]].
* Beren, a [[Gnomish]] name for [[Beorn (son of Heden)|Beorn]], son of [[Heden]], in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.
